info.name: StatementsOther
info.description: Describe your ADC here v1.0.5 - removed CSS3 Pie v1.0.6 - enabled control to be used in loops - added margin around responses - set columns to 1 when width is less than 350px - make all items the same height when there is more than one column - fix ie7 hover bug causing elements to move when hovering - fixed ie7 other text box resizing bug v1.0.7 - added range gradient direction variable v1.0.8 - fixed ie7/8 retained selection bug v1.0.9 - allow for multiple other please specifies v1.0.10 - other ID now references response id v1.0.11 - updated jquery to 1.11.1 - fixed image loading glitch v1.0.12 - fixed multiple other boxes not appearing problem v1.0.13 - fixed response sizing problem when merging screens v1.0.14 - fixed multiple other boxes appearing with exclusivity bug v1.0.15 - fixed alignment of the responses if column > 1 v1.0.16 - fixed height param and textbox overflow v1.0.17 - removed visibility:hidden for ControlContainer v2.0.0 - Theme implementation, v2.0.1 - PureJS version v2.0.2 - Fixed Height of the responses v2.0.4 - Forced single column when screen width < 480px v2.0.5 - Fixed visibility of the control v2.0.6 - Added Merge column width parameter v2.0.7 - Fixed AutoForward v2.0.8 - Fixed AutoForward v2.0.10 - Fixed visibility of the adc when used in loop with vertical sub form v2.0.11 - Fixed hover styling for small screen v2.0.12 - Fixed textarea visibility when unselected by exclusive response v2.0.13 - Fixed height when nb colmuns > 1 v2.0.14 - Fixed auto forward v2.0.15 - Added Flow direction v2.0.16 - Fixed Other text in database when unselect other v2.0.17 - Added alt attribute to img - Added aria-labels to textarea - Modifications for HTML5 compatibility v2.0.18 - Fixed closing div v2.0.19 - Fixed textbox visibility when single closed question and multiple others v2.0.20 - Fixed textbox data when single closed question and multiple others v2.0.21 - Fixed errors when single/multiple closed question without open ended. v2.0.22 - Fixed propagation on click on several other text. v2.0.23 - Fixed IE10 and lower v2.0.24 - Added non clickable responses (headers) v3.0.0 -Managed semi-open question with property types for D6 compatibility v3.0.2 - fixed response class on multiple on several columns v4.0.0 - Non clickable responses without prefixHeader v4.0.1 - Semi-open questions v4.0.2 - fix issue when columns > 0 v4.0.3 - active headers - issue fux v4.0.4 - AvailableResponses & manageHeader = true v4.0.5 - manageSemiOpen = true
info.author: Paul Ferreira <paulf@askia.com>

output.description: Fallback when the browser doesnacute;t support Javascript
Output when the browser support Javascript

property.name: Font Size
property.description: The font size for the control

property.name: Control Width
property.description: The width of the control

property.name: Max Width
property.description: The maximum width of the control

property.name: Control Alignment
property.description: The alignment of the control

property.name: Columns
property.description: The maximum width of the control

property.name: Flow direction of the columns
property.description: The flow direction when multi columns

property.name: Merge column width
property.description: Merge column width value in pixels

property.name: Text Alignment
property.description: The alignment of the text in the responses

property.name: Image Alignment
property.description: The alignment of the image in the responses

property.name: Border Radius
property.description: The amount of curve on the response corners

property.name: Animate Responses
property.description: Whether the resonses fly into the screen

property.name: Auto Forward
property.description: Whether the question continues to the next automatically if a single choice question

property.name: Use a selection list
property.description: Use a select list to enumerate all available responses. This option works with closed and numeric questions. For numeric question, the range between bounds should be inferior than 20. It take in account the step option.

property.name: Other Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the other response

property.name: Other Font Colour
property.description: Font colour of the other response

property.name: Other Border Colour
property.description: Border colour of the other response

property.name: Other Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the other response

property.name: Other Border Radius
property.description: The amount of curve on the other response corners

property.name: Other Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the other response

property.name: Other Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the other response

property.name: Response Text Padding
property.description: When set this will force the height of the reponses

property.name: Response Margin
property.description: This will set the margin around the responses

property.name: Response Text Line Height
property.description: When set this will force the height of the reponses

property.name: Response Height
property.description: When set this will force the height of the reponses

property.name: Response Width
property.description: When set this will force the width of the reponses

property.name: Response Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the item

property.name: Use a colour range
property.description: This will create a colour range between the primary and the range primary colours

property.name: Response Background Colour Range
property.description: Background colour of the item

property.name: Response Gradient Direction
property.description: The direction of the gradient on the responses

property.name: Response Font Colour
property.description: Font colour

property.name: Response Border Colour
property.description: Border colour

property.name: Response Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the responses

property.name: Response Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the responses

property.name: Response Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the responses

property.name: Show Response Hover Colour
property.description: This will change the colour of responses when hovered over

property.name: Response Hover Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the response when hovering

property.name: Show Response Hover Font Colour
property.description: This will change the colour of the text of responses when hovered over

property.name: Response Hover Font Colour
property.description: Font colour for responses when hovering

property.name: Show Response Hover Border
property.description: This will change the colour of the border of responses when hovered over

property.name: Response Hover Border Colour
property.description: Border colour for responses when hovering

property.name: Response Hover Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the responses when hovering

property.name: Response Hover Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the responses when hovering

property.name: Response Hover Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the responses when hovering

property.name: Selected Response Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the selected item

property.name: Selected Response Font Colour
property.description: Font colour for selected responses

property.name: Response Border Colour
property.description: Border colour for selected responses

property.name: Response Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the selected responses

property.name: Response Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the selected responses

property.name: Selected Response Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the selected responses

property.name: Number of Non-Scaled Responses
property.description: The number of responses from the end that will have different styling to the rest of the options

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the non-scaled item

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Font Colour
property.description: Font colour of non-scaled item

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Border Colour
property.description: Border colour of non-scaled item

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the non-scaled responses

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the non-scaled responses

property.name: Non-Scaled Response Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the non-scaled responses

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the selected non-scaled item

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Font Colour
property.description: Font colour for selected non-scaled responses

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Border Colour
property.description: Border colour for selected non-scaled responses

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Border Thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border around the selected non-scaled responses

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Border Style
property.description: The style of the border around the selected non-scaled responses

property.name: Selected Non-Scaled Response Drop Shadow
property.description: The visibility of a dropshadow under the selected non-scaled responses

property.name: Max Image Width
property.description: Set max image width

property.name: Max Image Height
property.description: Set max image height

property.name: Force image size
property.description: Force height or width for all images

property.name: Header Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the header item

property.name: Header Font Colour
property.description: Header colour
